titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Earhart Foundation records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is closed to research use until Jan. 1, 2035.

archdesc.scopecontent: Administrative records, files documenting grants approved, research and lecture funds files, supporting materials, and records of proposals denied.
